Literature.Title: Role of Aromatic Amino Acids in Lipopolysaccharide and Membrane Interactions of Antimicrobial Peptides for Use in Plant Disease Control
Literature.Author: Datta A, Bhattacharyya D, Singh S, Ghosh A, Schmidtchen A, Malmsten M, Bhunia A

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Cryptococcus neoformans var. grubii H99(MIC=50µM),Cryptococcus neoformans var. grubii H99(MIC=>50µM),Candida albicans SC5314(MIC=>50µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhi(MIC=>50µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=>50µM),Xanthomonas vesicatoria(MIC=25µM),Xanthomonas vesicatoria(MIC=>50µM),Xanthomonas oryzae(MIC=15µM),Xanthomonas oryzae(MIC=50µM)
